headline.main: Russia's Position Analyzed; Reputed Alliance With Germany Prior to June 22, 1941, Scrutinized

lead_paragraph: To THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In recent editorials you have referred to the "alliance" between Russia and Germany. Surely it is time we stopper spreading the myth that an "alliance existed between the U.S.S.R. and Germany prior to June 22, 1941. This "alliance" theory, constantly reiterated, has done a great deal of harm to good relations and understanding between the United States and the Soviet Union, and indirectly has served Hitler's purpose.
abstract: lr on German-USSR pact and Churchill's comments
